foreignData.name: Tempel der Erleuchtung
foreignData.text:
Der Tempel der Erleuchtung kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn der Tempel der Erleuchtung ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 1 an.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {U}.

foreignData.name: Templo de la iluminación
foreignData.text:
El Templo de la iluminación entra al campo de batalla girado.
Cuando el Templo de la iluminación entre al campo de batalla, adivina 1.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.

foreignData.name: Temple de l'illumination
foreignData.text:
Le Temple de l'illumination arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Quand le Temple de l'illumination arrive sur le champ de bataille, regard 1.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U}.

foreignData.name: Tempio dell'Illuminazione
foreignData.text:
Il Tempio dell'Illuminazione entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Quando il Tempio dell'Illuminazione entra nel campo di battaglia, profetizza 1.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U}.

foreignData.name: 啓蒙の神殿
foreignData.text:
啓蒙の神殿はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
啓蒙の神殿が戦場に出たとき、占術１を行う。
{T}：{W}か{U}を加える。

foreignData.name: Templo da Iluminação
foreignData.text:
Templo da Iluminação entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Templo da Iluminação entrar no campo de batalha, use vidência 1.
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {U}.

foreignData.name: Храм Просвещения
foreignData.text:
Храм Просвещения выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
Когда Храм Просвещения выходит на поле битвы, предскажите 1.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {U}.

foreignData.name: 启蒙殿堂
foreignData.text:
启蒙殿堂须横置进战场。
当启蒙殿堂进战场时，占卜1。
{T}：加{W}或{U}。

foreignData.name: 啟蒙殿堂
foreignData.text:
啟蒙殿堂須橫置進戰場。
當啟蒙殿堂進戰場時，占卜1。
{T}：加{W}或{U}。

name: Temple of Enlightenment
originalText:
Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

text:
Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
